title: Aatrox will be forgotten after his gutting

replies.body: He's become what they set out to prevent: a balancing nightmare. At this point might as well semi revert him and see how it goes.
aatrox was already super weak... His ult seems like a passive etc... Put aatrox against garen and ggggggg

> [{quoted}](name=feintfiend,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lI1Ad6wZ,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-02-06T13:01:43.019+0000)
>
> Quote me on this

Who is Aatrox?
BIG FACTS, champion ruined, riot will act like they don't notice. HONESTLY before the move on to reworks and other such garbage they need to fix the champs they broke

So ask pros to stop using him? He's been basically pick ban since his rework and carried that pattern on from Worlds to now. Can you imagine what they'd have to do to buff Yorick to get that kind of playrate in pros? The fact Ssumday even played him was amazing.
